system.effect: When Blastoise uses Aqua Jet, Dive, Flash Cannon, Hydro Cannon, Hydro Pump, Tackle, Waterfall, Water Gun, and Water Spout they may activate this Ability to gain +2 to their Accuracy Roll and deals +4 Bonus Damage with Damage Rolls. When using Aqua Jet, Dive, Tackle, or Waterfall, Blastoise must shift in a straight line to their target to activate this Ability, but their Overland and Swim Speeds are increased by +2 when doing so.
